official_title: A Pragmatic Randomized Intervention Using Text Messages Prior to Primary Care Visits to Encourage Care Gap Closure: The PRIME Randomized Clinical Trial
inclusion_criteria:
* Age 18 or older
* Have documented consent to communicate electronically
* Have a visit scheduled with a primary care practice
* Have at least one open care gap among those in the intervention
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * No phone number on file to send text messages
